title: 11 years old boy killed, 2 other people wounded, including a 13 years old girl as result of Russian shelling with MLRS Tornad...
content: 11 years old boy killed, 2 other people wounded, including a 13 years old girl as result of Russian shelling with MLRS Tornado in Pershomaryivka village of Donetsk region
author: Live UA Map
